name: Arkanoid For Painters
description: On one distant planet lost in space lives a race of amphibians. As if on their planet there was a catastrophe and now the underwater world is in danger. From the sushi they are approached by stone walls consisting of blocks of different colors. You in the game Arkanoid for Painters will have to help them destroy them. To do this you need to use the ball floating in the water. With the help of the mouse you will have to throw the ball in the direction of the wall and it hitting the block will destroy it and fly back. You will have to calculate the trajectory of her flight and push back with a mouse. Then he will fly back again. So you will destroy the wall.
